titleStmt.title: A solemne league and covenant, for reformation, and defence of religion, the honour and happinesse of the king, and the peace and safety of the three kingdoms of Scotland, England, and Ireland.
Solemn League and Covenant (1643)
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: "Subscribers of the league and covenant," p. 6, with signatures.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
